messages.content: KKR take on MI in the playoffs on Wednesday looking for a win to move on the finals of the IPL-4...We request you to attend the game and support our team all the way...
KKR take on MI in their final league game at the Eden Gardens...We request you to attend the game and support our team!...Korbo Lorbo Jitbo Re!
KKR take on the Pune Warriors at the D.Y>Patil stadium in Navi Mumbai...We invite you to attend the match and support our team...
KKR take on RCB in Bangalore on the 14th May...We invite ou to attend the game and support our team...
KKR take on CSK at home...We invite you to attend the match and support our team!
KKR will look to keep up the momentum against DC on 03/05 at 8PM in Hyderabad.
We invite you to attend the KKR vs KXIP game on 30/04/11 at 8PM...
KKR take on DD at the Ferozeshah Kotla on 28th April 2011...We invite you to attend the game and cheer for our team...
